WorkItem.ClosedComment: User's PC issue - use a Zip program NOT windows built in zip
WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded the zip of rawr 2.3.20
I got to extract and notice it says it will be 50 minutes till its done.
I cancel and noticed everything extracted except the talent_images folder and everything in it.
I then try to extract just that folder and says it will take 40 minutes to extract again.
My question is why? Are you compressing that folder so much that it takes intense cpu power to do fast?
Is that folder needed for rawr to work properly and what is it for?

Comments.Message: I've had similar issues with some unzipping programs previously (maybe it was the built in windows one - not sure) and it was taking 5-10 mins.   I'm currently using 7zip from www.7-zip.org and even on this pretty crap work PC it only takes about 30secs to unzip.
Thank you RareBeast. Your right, something with windows built in zip handler doesnt like the deep folder tree. I used 7zip and it was speedy.
